H0.text: What was Tony Blair’s constituency. Sedgefield

H1.text: What was Tony Blair’s constituency. Newcastle upon Tyne Central

H2.text: What was Tony Blair’s constituency. Gateshead

H3.text: What was Tony Blair’s constituency. Segfield

A4.text: Blair was Member of Parliament (MP) for Sedgefield from 1983 to 2007

A5.text: He became involved in the Labour Party and was elected to the House of Commons in 1983 for the Sedgefield constituency in County Durham
